cast.name: 芭芭拉·伊芙·哈里斯 Barbara Eve Harris

awards:
第69届柏林国际电影节(2019)
　　新生代少年单元 国际评审团最佳长片(提名) 凯思琳·赫博恩

writer.name: 凯思琳·赫博恩 Kathleen Hepburn

director.name: 凯思琳·赫博恩 Kathleen Hepburn

this_title: The Body Remembers When the World Broke Open
trans_title: 身体记着世间何时崩裂
introduction: When Áila encounters a young Indigenous woman, barefoot and crying in the rain on the side of a busy street, she soon discovers that this young woman, Rosie, has just escaped a violent assault at the hands of her boyfriend. Áila decides to bring Rosie home with her and over the course of the evening, the two navigate the aftermath of this traumatic event.
chinese_title: 身体记着世间何时崩裂
foreign_title: The Body Remembers When the World Broke Open
